post.description: Order Id generation request usually called before calling order validate api.

requestBody.description: Parameters required for order id generation.

OrderGenerateIdRequest.description: Model representing MTCN generation request schema.

msgId.description: Unique message id represnting perticular request.

ruc.description: Starting 3 digit of the MTCN generated.It can be fixed RUC or random.

OrderGenerateIdResponse.description: Model representing MTCN generation response schema.

msgID.description: Unique message id representing this order id generation request.

longData.description: Long representation of OrderId. 6 digit range in the generated OrderId.

checkDigit.description: Check digit for OrderId, which is the last digit in the generated Order Id.

ruc.description: Starting 3 digit of the generated OrderId. It can be fixed RUC or random.

MsgRequestTypes.description: Request MOCN types (1 - LIVE,2 - TEST,3 - MSGN).
